com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.callout

Class SCCallOutHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.callout.SCCallOutHelper

  • public class SCCallOutHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to get the proxy for a given callout and executing the implementations for the callout sanumukonda

      Returns an instance of SCCallOutClassLoader which loads all the classes in the classLoaderPath classLoaderPath The path to the directory containing the callout implementations and any third party jars callOutId The unique identifier for the callout instance of SCCallOutClassLoader

        This handles executing the callout implementations in the same thread. callOut The SCCallOut instance holding the metadata of the callout methodName The method to be invoked on each of the callout implementations input The input parameters to be passed to the method pTypes The type of each input parameter above SCCallOutResponse Returns an instance of SCCallOutResponse which indicates whether the execution is complete/incomplete and whether any input has been modified etc.
